item.title: Party Recharge Hydrating Hyaluronic Under Eye Masks
item.dc:creator: Tinh Le
item.description:
-Hyaluronic Acid: Helps hydrates skin. -Niacinamide: Balances skin. -Real Crystal Extract: Cools the skin.
Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Methylpropanediol, Chondrus Crispus (Seaweed) Extract, Niacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Diamond Powder, Nephrite Powder, Amethyst Powder, Tourmaline, Pearl Powder, Ruby Powder, Sapphire Powder, Silver, Potassium Chloride, Allantoin, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Sucrose, Cellulose Gum, Xanthan Gum, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Acrylates Copolymer, Ci 77000 (Aluminum), Polyethylene Terephthalate, Disodium Edta, Hydroxyacetophenone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Parfum (Fragrance).
item.content:encoded:
What it is: A pair of sparkling, ultra-hydrating under-eye masks that recharges your eyes.

Highlighted Ingredients:
– Hyaluronic Acid: Helps hydrates skin.
– Niacinamide: Balances skin.
– Real Crystal Extract: Cools the skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. It is also cruelty-free.

What Else You Need to Know: These sparkling under-eye masks use a cooling hydrogel, with light-catching glitter, and hydrating and nourishing ingredients to visibly reduce puffiness and brighten dark circles. They are also made with hyaluronic acid to hydrate, while niacinamide balances and real crystal extract cools.
